message.body: I'm thinking about making my students go shoot and edit a 1 minute doc within class tomorrow. Sound like a disaster?
We did in class interviews of eachother yesterday, they chose their own locations and questions. It went really well except I should have made the questions!
We didn't have time to edit Or anything but the shooing was great!
I think it's a good idea!
That's a good suggestion! How many interviews did you guys do?

We did 9 interviews, three groups of three so one on camera one sound one subject. They asked three questions per group of their choice. I wish they all had the same questions though, could edit Together nicely!
Took about an hour to do the shooting and an hour to watch and talk about choices, framing, natural Light, sound and interview Tips
Awesome. Thanks, dude!
Haha. Did you make crybaby noises at them?
Yeah!!! Good luck with those lil punks
Haha. I was so tempted to be like who's the whiner here?
Haha. I think I know in my class.
But I don't know their names.
Haha. I do lots of that. I may turn a paper into a final project treatment.
But I did extend their next Project due date to after the break and then only a final project left
"Who are you again?"
That's a good idea!
And the ethics paper will now be on the ethics of ratting your teacher out.
Hahahahha.
I'm gonna do that
Yes. Make them read it in front if the class like dawn wiener in welcome To the dollhouse
Pancakes tmw if you have time?
Aw hell yeah. PANCAKES!
Yessss. I can't wait!!!!!
Cool, talk then !
Great! Have a good class
Classes plural
Thanks : )
